title: IND_ACQ Reference PDF Page Mapping
description: Maps generated pack pages to reference PDF pages for shared-page comparison

page_mappings.notes: Both are executive summary pages with key metrics
Both are returns summary pages with IRR/multiple highlights
Reference page includes error check and cashflow summary sections
Both include sources/uses and model outputs matrix
Annual cashflow summary appears on reference page 6
Core assumptions page, may have different layout
Rent roll appears on reference page 9
Renovation budget appears on reference page 10
Monthly CF section starts on reference page 12

unmapped_generated_pages.reason: Continuation of monthly cashflow; reference page mapping TBD
Continuation of monthly cashflow; reference page mapping TBD

reference_only_pages: Waterfall calculations (reference has LP/GP waterfall structure)
SOFR/rate schedules (reference has detailed rate curves)

comparison_strategy.description: Only compare pages listed in page_mappings (conservative approach)
comparison_strategy.strict_mode: Fails if any mapped page exceeds threshold

notes: Conservative mapping - only pages with high/medium confidence
Reference PDF has additional modules not in our IND_ACQ template
Unmapped pages are still validated for layout but not pixel-diffed
To add mappings: visually compare PDFs and add entries with confidence level
Mapping can be expanded as template evolves to include waterfall, comps, etc.
